metaData.description: This data entity provides meta data about the first mile farm data

0exportDate.description: Date when the data has been exported from the database into first-mile-farm-data-schema
0exportDate.title: Export date

1dataProvidersID.description: Legal registration number of the organisation that converted its data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
1dataProvidersID.title: Legal registration number of the data provider

2dataProvidersName.description: Official name of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format
2dataProvidersName.title: data provider name

3dataProvidersGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schemaindicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd
3dataProvidersGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the data provider

4datasetDescription.description: Description of the data set that is converted into first-mile-farm-data-schema
4datasetDescription.title: Dataset description

5dataProvidersPointofContact.description: Contact point of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
5dataProvidersPointofContact.title: data provider point of contact

6dataProvidersAdress.description: The legally registered address of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema.
6dataProvidersAdress.title: data providers lega; adress

metaData.title: Meta_data
